- Changed Search history UI
- Added Dash List

1. 综合搜索功能改善
2. 图片搜索显示框内关键词输入区添加
3. 首页及今日特价UI改善
4. 限时特价内性别条件部分添加
5. 其他修改

Fix video playback issues
Fixed bug & Performance improvements

1. Improved function in Deal page
2. Added delivery step to track package in Qbox
3. Adopted 3D touch on launcher icon for shortcut
4. Adopted multilingual contents/API
5. Bug fixes

2. Bugs fixed

- Improved Main page UI
- Improved Category map UI
- Bug fixes

- Improved UI in Main page
- Improved UI in Side menu
- Improved Search UI /function in search/ category page
- Bug fixes

1. Various search filters can be set in the product list; setting filtering option has been improved for enabling to adjust the filters at a glance.
2. You can easily browse various items from another countries by shipping departure countries and delivery method.
3. Interface has been improved to clearly show the amount of rewards offered on 'Share', for the Reward Program that grants reward by recommendation of items.
4. If you linked the membership account with another countries' Qoo10 sites, you can directly move to another countries' Qoo10 sites in the side menu.

Qoo10 is integrated into one!

Existing Qoo10 Global, ID, MY, CN, and HK customers can shop with the integrated Qoo10 app.
Now you do not have to download apps for different countries, you can access all countries with just one integrated app.

You can also log into your new Qoo10 app with your existing account in just a few steps.

We hope you enjoy shopping in the newly integrated Qoo10 app!

Qoo10 is integrated into one!

Existing Qoo10 Global, ID, MY, CN, and HK customers can shop with the integrated Qoo10 app.
Now you do not have to download apps for different countries, you can access all countries with just one integrated app.

You can also log into your new Qoo10 app with your existing account in just a few steps.

We hope you enjoy shopping in the newly integrated Qoo10 app!

1. Various search filters can be set in the product list; setting filtering option has been improved for enabling to adjust the filters at a glance.
2. You can easily browse various items from another countries by shipping departure countries and delivery method.
3. Interface has been improved to clearly show the amount of rewards offered on 'Share', for the Reward Program that grants reward by recommendation of items.
4. If you linked the membership account with another countries' Qoo10 sites, you can directly move to another countries' Qoo10 sites in the side menu.
